meanings.definition: The incorrect alignment or positioning of printed images or colors in a printing process.
meanings.sent1: The misregistration of colors on the poster made it look blurry.
meanings.sent2: The misregistration of the images on the brochure was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The misregistration of the colors on the banner gave it a funky, artistic vibe.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a misregistration of thoughts, all jumbled up and out of place.
meanings.sent5: The misregistration of the logo on the packaging was a costly mistake for the company.

meanings.definition: The act or process of registering something incorrectly or inaccurately.
meanings.sent1: The misregistration of the student's name in the attendance sheet caused confusion.
meanings.sent2: She apologized for the misregistration of the meeting time in her calendar.
meanings.sent3: The misregistration of the address on the invitation led to unexpected guests.
meanings.sent4: His misregistration of the deadline resulted in a late submission.
meanings.sent5: The misregistration of the phone number on the form caused communication issues.
